page.description: Release the result set from the last SQL select statement.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

section.note: Calling FreeResult is not generally necessary. Call it to free resources when there will be a delay between queries.

section.description: The FreeResult() method releases the result set from the last SQL select statement. Calling FreeResult()is not generally necessary. Call it to free resources when there will be a delay between queries.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C cs = "{A5API=Access,FileName='C:\Program Files\A5V8\MDBFiles\Alphasports.mdb',UserName='Admin'}" if .not. conn.open(cs) then ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if ... do stuff if .not. conn.FreeResult()then ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end if conn.close()
